content:
path /v3/multitoken/mint
operationId MintMultiToken
parameters
description Type of testnet Defaults to Sepolia Valid only for ETH invocations
in header
name xtestnettype
required False
schema
default ethereumsepolia
type string
summary Mint a Multi Token
description 2 credits per API call
Mint a fixed amount of Multi Token and transfer it to destination account Create and transfer any Multi Token token from smart contract defined in contractAddress It is possible to add Metadata to the created token with a more detailed information about instead
This API is supported for the following blockchains

BNB Smart Chain
Celo
Ethereum
Harmony
Klaytn
KuCoin Community Chain
Polygon

Signing a transaction
When minting a Multi Token you are charged a fee for the transaction and you must sign the transaction with the private key of the blockchain address from which the fee will be deducted
Providing the private key in the API is not a secure way of signing transactions because the private key can be stolen or exposed Your private keys should never leave your security perimeter You should use the private keys only for testing a solution you are building on the testnet of a blockchain
For signing transactions on the mainnet we strongly recommend that you use the Tatum Key Management System KMS and provide the signature ID instead of the private key in the API Alternatively you can use the Tatum JavaScript client
requestBody
oneOf
MintMultiToken
type object
properties
chain
type string
description Chain to work with
tokenId
description ID of token to be created
type string
maxLength 32

maxLength 42
minLength 42
description Blockchain address to send Multi Token token to

maxLength 42
minLength 42
description Address of Multi Token token
type string

description amount of token to be created
type string
maxLength 32
data
description Data in bytes
type string
fromPrivateKey
type string
maxLength 66
minLength 66
description Private key of sender address Private key or signature Id must be present
nonce
type number
minimum 0
description Nonce to be set to transaction If not present last known nonce will be used
fee
description Custom defined fee If not present it will be calculated automatically

description The internal Tatum ID of the prepared transaction for Key Management Sysytem KMS to signThis is different from the signatureId parameter that you provided in the request body The signatureId parameter in the request body specifies the signature ID associated with the private key in KMS
